tool_description: Free Online QR code generator API is a dynamic QR code generator. In other words, as long as you pass in different parameters, Free QR API will instantly generate the QR code you want that can be directly used as image URL.
name: Free online QR code generator
title: Free online QR code generator

api_list.name: Generate QR code
api_list.description:
Generate QR code in real time. This API endpoint can be directly used as QR code image src in your html page.
The error correction for this API is set to M (around 15%)

required_parameters.name: qr_content
required_parameters.description:
The destination of the QR code after people scanning it.
e.g.:
https://company.aotol.com Send user to the url
mailto:admin@aotol.com Open mail client to send email
tel:1234567 Make a phone call to 1234567
*Special characters(such as '?', '&' and '#') are required to be encoded if used as API input parameter's value.*
required_parameters.default: The destination of the QR code after people scanning it.

optional_parameters.name: qr_color
optional_parameters.description:
Specify the color of the QR code image.
The value is a HEX code of color **without #**

For example, black is 000000

optional_parameters.name: qr_logo
optional_parameters.description:
The logo image URL at the center of QR code. If no logo is required, skip this parameter. Note: Always test the QR code with a scanner (such as your phone) if logo is added to the QR code.

*Special characters(such as '?', '&' and '#') are required to be encoded if used as API input parameter's value.*
optional_parameters.default: The logo image URL at the center of QR code. If no logo is required, skip this parameter. Note: Always test the QR code with a scanner (such as your phone) if logo is added to the QR code.
